attribute.description: Returns true if the chip has no NDL IOValid bits
Use nest buckets for mc_pll_bndy for cumulus
Returns true if MPW2 bits should be set
Returns true if the core trace arrays are not dumpable via SCOM. Nimbus EC 0x10
Returns true if the trace array TRCTRL registers do not have run, run_sticky and hold_run bits Nimbus EC 0x10
Returns if a chip contains the TEST1 feature. True if either: Centaur EC 10 Cumulus EC greater than 30
Returns if a chip contains the TEST2 feature. True if: Murano EC less than 20
DD1 attribute for assigning flushvalues to root_ctrl and perv_ctrl registers. True if: Nimbus EC less than 20
DD1 update : Flush mode not initiated for N3. True if: Nimbus EC less than 20
DD1 only: disable local clock gating VITAL. This is used by the procedure for p9_sbe_tp_chiplet_init1 and p9_Sbe_chiplet_reset.
Sdis_n set or clear : flushing LCBES condition woraround. True if: Nimbus EC less than 20
Nimbus DD1 only: Thread rebalancing to lower SMT level not supported.
Filter pll setting differences. Cumulus matches nimbus dd2.
DD1 only config, issue: HW365079 Planning on enabling it with an irritator.
HW367017 P9N DD1 Collision with scrubber correcting a CE and a castout operation, resulting in cache corruption Scrubbing off for DD2 as well, HW405443
HW393692 - need to turn off NCU hardware checker (fir bit 2) for illegal tlbies/slbie formats for DD1.
HW372146 For turning off clock gating on nctlbsm
HW405413 : NCU sends data out of order
HW328175 : PB mode register does not reflect steady-state value of PB init
HW367321 clock gating bug on err_rpt
HW254454: In P9 DD1, DRAM_ABIST_DONE_DC is unused; SRAM_ABIST_DONE_DC is shared by sram and edram
Max 24 64-byte read buffers (HW375534)

FOR P9N DD1 Prefetch Limit needs to be scan init to 0 because SCOM is broken (HW366248) Always OR-ed with previous value. Essentially we can only set bits, not clear. So we want to scan init to 0. these are n1 n3
Nimbus DD1 only: HW395756
Nimbus DD1 only: HW396288 - Dispatch Serialize all mtmsrd
Nimbus DD1 only: HW394497 - Turn all mtfpscr/mffspcr ops Dispatch Serialize to enable speculative FPSCR. (HW374002)
Nimbus DD1 only: HW394447 / HW394186
Nimbus DD1 only: HW393129
Nimbus DD1 only: HW393318 - Turn all decimal quad ops Dispatch Serialize.
Nimbus DD1/DD2.0, Cumulus DD1.0: HW393547, HW413718
Nimbus DD2.0, Cumulus DD1.0: HW416227 - Disable Tracker
Nimbus DD1 only: HW393929 / HW394578
Nimbus DD1 only: HW362088
Nimbus DD1 only: HW391334 / HW391367

Nimbus DD1 only: HW387890 NOTE: should be turned back off if LSU gets stuck in a cyclical ntc_plz loop. This switch was added in RITB as part of a large, multiple-fix solution for the cycling ntc_plz with DEFAULT=OFF.
Nimbus DD1 only: HW384613
Nimbus DD1 only: HW373955
Nimbus DD1 only: HW381889 - Disable TM ROT mode
Nimbus DD1 only: HW379315 - Fix tiered hangbuster triggering ntc_plz
Nimbus DD1 only: HW347876 - default not correct
Nimbus DD1 only: HW373955 - In Radix Mode: Page Walk Cache unsupported HW361596 / HW371500 / HW373955 - In SDR1 mode and UPRT=1 mode: Disable Page Walk Cache hits
Nimbus DD1 only: DD1 Defer -ldmx not supported (i.e. Garbage Collection RFC02491)
Nimbus DD1 only: HW359913 / HW356752 ltptr not supported - will be treated as an illegal instruction
Nimbus DD1 only: HW364229 - enb_reduce_spec mode, causes a tlbie hang
Nimbus DD1 only: HW330187 - Instruction Fusion not supported
Nimbus DD1 only: HW371453
Nimbus DD1 only: HW379562 - Turn off store-forward to LQ
Nimbus DD1 only: HW376310 - Disable forcing TM loads to miss the DDIR1
Nimbus DD1 only: HW371047 - TMDIR disabled due to multi-threaded issue.
Nimbus DD1 only: HW373589 - Reject 2nd of lqarx pair ops if they are on back-to-back cycles.
Nimbus DD1 only: HW373167 - Problems with arbitrating between NTC and NTC+1 flush requests when one is recoverable and the other involves trechkpt.
Nimbus DD1 only: HW372808 - TM hwsync does not wait on load
Nimbus DD1 only: HW372208 - larx missed bad dval
Nimbus DD1 only: HW373137 - Stop prefetch and invalidate erat collison causing erat multihits
Nimbus DD1 only: HW371867 - Performance enhancement that is too buggy to leave enabled
Nimbus DD1 only: HW368478 - S2Q clock gate has to be disabled
Nimbus DD1 only: HW360131 - POR value is an invalid combination and is not represented in the dial.
Nimbus DD1 only: HW370085 - IFU can send an erroneous 2nd "force miss" to the LSU on a shared translation, causing an unnecessary table walk.
Nimbus DD1 only: HW369677 - Dynamic set delete not implemented
Nimbus DD1 only: HW367863 - Workaround when EAT thinks it's empty and IDU still reports that it's out of itags.
Nimbus DD1 only: HW365384 - data prefetch clock gate needed
Nimbus DD1 only: HW365576 - Need to disable reset of LRQ deallocate bit
Nimbus DD1 only: HW365510 - TM merging in the LRQ not supported - disable with chicken switch
Nimbus DD1.0 DD2.0, Cumulus DD1.0 HW353069 / HW358383 / HW358418 / HW358662 / HW358824 / HW363605 Not doing Performance: MB State - Need to disable speculative stwcx
Nimbus DD1 only: HW363926 - Workaround for clockgating bug for Local Very Good Mode (performance)
Nimbus DD1 only: HW339090 / HW354135 - Branch flush performance
Nimbus DD1 only: HW361821 - Icache way prediction must be disabled for all SMT modes except SMT1
Nimbus DD1 only: HW380199 - L2 store reordering induced consistency bug Only set at safest risk level
Nimbus DD1 only: HW399524 disable functionality, can only be enabled on non-FP/VMX tests
Nimbus DD1 only: adjust/relax SRAM timing parameters
Nimbus DD1 only: HW369979; Defer to DD2: [GRUB multi chiplet] l3_fir_reg_l3_hw_control_err L3 FIR bit 24 (mask control_err(2) by setting dial: err_rpt0_mask(2) to ON)
Nimbus DD1 only: HW378093; Defer to DD2: edram_info_capture_cfg defaults to wrong value
Nimbus DD1 only: HW288205 (P8 CQ) : L3 PF Hang fix. Change behavior of L3 Prefetch Back-off mechanism HW392168 (P9 CQ) : This bug existed in P8 and was set to 0x4. The bug was not fixed
Nimbus DD1 only: HW406803 : bug with calculating home region for LCO's using wrong bit44
Nimbus DD1 only: Enable work around for HW392009 Auto Special Wakeup Disables [LMCR(12:13)]. Do not scan flush to 1s.

DD1 only: HW377094 L2 stq and ncu stq deadlock. g/ord_g causes artificial dependency between barrier and snptlbcmp in NCU while lfsr bits being reused in L2 stq causes entry to never be selected due to high priority ld-hit-st override.
DD1 only: HW398015 work around
DD1 only: HW396393 rare TM fail condition.
DD1 only: HW374111 snapshot doesn't work for domestic copy that hits the L2 cache. all 16 RC machines need to turn off clock gating
DD1 only: HW373819 PEC SBCE could cause coherency problems when running in conjunction with copy/paste
DD1 only: HW370687 xlate_addr_to_id clock gating bug
DD1 only: HW370692 deadlock allowing snptlbcmp to pass around stcxf
DD1 only: HW394803 - Fatal Venus: Critical section fail
DD1 only: HW370984 - No wakeup from hypdbell to core 1 stopped in level 2 ESL=0 (SMT1 test)
DD1 only: HW376874
DD1 only: mask TFAC parity errors (HW319315)
DD1 only: enable workarounds for HW385178 - Force SMT4 mode for Stop 1 and 2 SPR loss
DD1 only: enable workarounds for HW393734 - Stop2 hang workaround
DD1 only: enable workarounds for HW396520 (skip flushmode inhibit drop)
DD1 only: enable workarounds for HW388878 (VCS)
Nimbus DD1 only: enable workarounds for HW376651 Masks ahash parity error checker to avoid FiR when running EX1 only configs
DD1 only: enable workarounds for HW389511 (PPM Reg collision)
Nimbus DD1 only: enable workarounds for HW386013 in FBC initfile pb_cfg_cent_opt3_mode must be configured as an smp to allow vas data
Nimbus DD1,DD2: enable workarounds for HW407123 in FBC initfile Slow down xlink cmd rate to work around broken single link credit dial that would have prevented rcmd overflows
Nimbus DD2.X: enable workarounds for HW409019 in FBC initfile Set single link credit workaround in numbus dd2.x, revert in p9c
Configure NMMU for Nimbus DD1
PWC disable for DD2
Enabling PDE fix for dd2 only, not needed going forward
NMMU does not require application of issue734 fixes Issue734 exists on Nimbus dd2.1+
Nimbus DD1 only: enable workarounds for HW378025 in INT initfile Shared credits in ATX can only be updated when clockgate is disabled
Nimbus DD1 only: enable workarounds for HW930007 in INT initfile
Nimbus DD1 only: enable workarounds for HW372116 in INT initfile Remote Ld credit in PC should be set to zero to avoid ATX dropped commands
Nimbus DD1 only: enable workarounds for HW395947 in INT initfile Workaround for relaxed write ordering causing SBT entry corruption
Nimbus DD1,DD2: enable workarounds for HW408972 in INT initfile Workaround for missing escalation bug with group interrupts
Anything NOT Nimbus DD1: enable workarounds for HW414702 in INT initfile Workaround for clockgating bug with vpc at kill accessing bad data
Nimbus DD1 only: enable workaround for HW395947 Disable cross-chip MC sync propogation
Nimbus DD1 only: enable half speed PSI link operation due to relaxed chip timing closure
DD1 only: to do an LPC reset set the GPIO bits
DD1.00 only: lock phase rotator
DD1.01/DD1.02 only: disable DDC
DD1 only: run XBUS at reduced frequency (14.4 instead of 16) to based on HW393297
DD1 only: enable use of SS PLL to provide reduced frequency reference clock (94 MHz, instead of nominal 100 MHz) for PCI PLL
DD1 only: restrict NVLINK frequency to 20gbs
Nimbus DD1 only: set L3/NCU skip group scope via scan only
Nimbus DD1.X, DD2.0: Leave at default value of DIV_BY_10
Nimbus DD1; set to 0b000 Numbus DD2+; set to 0b110
Nimbus DD1 only: set the optimal dial setups for LCO's via scan
Disable cp_me from the L3 for Nimbus DD1 and DD2.0
Nimbus DD1: Larx/stcx dials are non performance tuned
Nimbus DD2+: HW409069 load_larx protection not activated because of dtag_data_resp in hot lock load loop pvp test
Nimbus DD1 only: enable workaround for HW383616 Restrict GP/SP high water mark
Nimbus DD1 only: enable workaround for HW384245 Restrict TL DOB limit
Nimbus DD1 only: n3_br_fure is non-scannable
Nimbus DD1: Silent Baron: TB and DEC SPRs stray apart with TOD enabled
Nimbus DD1: mask EC local error from CC
Nimbus DD1: Tired Grandpa -- CHKSW_DONT_PRIORITIZE_BRQ_MF
Nimbus DD1: Intense Skunk -- CS_LOW_POWER_PRIORITY_MODE_DIS
Nimbus DD1: Rich Starlight -- increase core hang limit to engage L2 random block gather LFSR
Nimbus DD1: IMA interval timer overcounts based on missing edge detect
Nimbus DD1: Major Queen
Nimbus DD1: Silly Plutonium
Nimbus DD1: Hungry Shark
Nimbus DD1: Reckless Carpenter
Nimbus DD1: NCU AMO load ordering error

attribute.description: HW413799 - ECC checking in SDKSMRF causes false failures
HW414370 - TM atomicity failure
HW415857 - Multiple marks can occur on CI ops - mask checker
HW414597 - ISU clockgating bug concerning PMU events
HW415480 - PMU Overflow exception issue
HW415236 - ISU flush restore problem
HW415988 - Ucon state machine is not currently POR for P9
HW415114 - Disable zombie stores
HW415013 - IFU branch issue
HW414384 - ISU recovery timeout workaround
HW413853 - Issue with FPSCR sticky bits
HW413917 - Clock gating 241 issue
HW414249 - Workaround for orphans causing SLB multihits
HW414375 - DDIR false parity error issue
HW414829 - Disable hotlocks
HW417829 - Bad rfscv branch
HW417242 - Software hang on TM HB Full
HW417734 - NTC_FLUSH_PENDING_IN_RAM during thread reconfig
HW414871 - TLBIE hang workaround
For DD1, VAS has no BAR disable bit. Adding attribute to enable non zero init for the MMIO BARs. Issue HW395939
Returns true if dd1. Less than Nimbus ec 0x20
Nimbus DD1: Reduce rng pace from 2000->300 to work around grant unfairness
Nimbus DD1: Reduce number of active DMA read requests down from 16->8 to work around erat access count bug
Nimbus DD1: Workaround clockgating bug with APC machines missing deassert

attributes.attribute:
ATTR_CHIP_EC_FEATURE_HW403585> TARGET_TYPE_PROC_CHIP
Nimbus DD1: Treacherous Dolphin
ENUM_ATTR_NAME_NIMBUS
0x20 LESS_THAN

attribute.description: Nimbus DD1 only: Adding delay to wait for pibreset to complete
Nimbus DD1: set ABIST engines to PARALLEL mode.
DD1 only: Use the DD1 register addresses for the PHY0 BAR registers, PHY1 BAR registers, and MMIO BAR registers
Inits for skewAdj in P9 ndd1. These are different from the default inits used starting in NDD2.
Inits for dutyCycleAdj in P9 ndd1. These are different from the default inits used starting in NDD2.

attributes.attribute:
ATTR_CHIP_EC_FEATURE_HW397129> TARGET_TYPE_PROC_CHIP
Attribute for if we need a workaround for re-enabling the MC fastpath since on Nimbus DD1 is gets disabled.
ENUM_ATTR_NAME_NIMBUS
0x20 LESS_THAN

attribute.description: Data integrity issue requires us to disable clockgate in read array for Nimbus DD1.0
Addresses issue where MDI bit was getting wrong values with threadmill and transactional data resulting in coherency issues.
Avoid powerbus early hangs by enabling prefetch drops to break out of fairness issue with prefetch ops
ATAG info corruption on presp issue requires us to disable clockgate for Nimbus DD1.0
Need AMO caching disabled for multiple defects until Nimbus DD2.0
Noise window disabled in DD1 because continually reocurring intermittent UE's can cause us to hang on refreshes.
Nimbus DD1 only: spoof pb_init in cache contained mode Enables L2 checkers to monitor for transactions arbitrating to broadcast onto the fabric
Nimbus DD1 only: scan ON NCU_TLBIE_QUISCE fence for non-cache contained modes. Flush state corrected in HW for future revisions
Use Nimbus DD1 CXA spy register definition names
Use Nimbus DD1 Obus spy register definition names
Use Nimbus DD1 DDR PHY spy register definition names
Program MCA ECC logic to support Nimbus DD1 asynchronus boundary crossing requirements
Nimbus DD1 core spy behavior qualifier
Nimbus DD1 only -- PCI Nest stack error report registers cannot be cleared
Nimbus DD2.0 only -- apply PCI PLL and VGA gain EDGEMOD workarounds to enable GEN4 operation
Nimbus DD2.0 only -- set all UE FIRs to checkstop
Nimbus DD[12] -- XB PLL lock reporting is unreliable based on unused x0 instance
MCBIST has a bug where it won't detect the end of a rank properly for a 1R DIMM during super-fast read.
WAT Debug Attention work-around for Nimbus DD1.0
Attribute used only for memory subsystem procedures. Tells us whether the chip EC we're running on is less than 2.0 and we're on a Nimbus
In DD1 Nimbus in the WR VREF algorithm, certain work-arounds are needed
In DD1 Nimbus, the sofware DCD calibration needs to be run, as it does not exist in HW
For Monza DDR port 2, one pair of DQS P/N is swapped polarity.
VREF DAC work-around for Nimbus DD1.0
For Nimbus pre DD1.02 we want to pass DDR training if we see 'correctable' errors. This isn't the case for post-DD1.02 where we want to pass/fail training based on the results from the PHY itself
In below DD2 Nimbus, the HW VREF calibration needs to be checked against the chip subversion to see if it can be run.
In below DD2 Nimbus, a workaround after read centering might need to be run.
For Nimbus pre DD2.** we need to swap ODT2 and ODT3 values in the DDRPHY_SEQ_ODT_RD/WR_CONFIG registers due to a PHY erratum. Post DD2.** will have a hardware enabled fix for this (HW389360).
In DD1.** Nimbus, the blue waterfall can calibrate to an incorrect value. In DD2 Nimbus, This isn't the case as the HW will not allow this calibration value
In below DD2 Nimbus, the RD VREF cal VREF sense needs to be checked against the chip subversion to see if it should be run.
In DD1.** Nimbus, if we get a DQS fail from DQS_ALIGN in draminit_training, we rerun DQS_ALIGN for the failing bit for a set number of times or until it passed
Only set the disable memory clock stop when in STR for DD2.* Doesn't work for DD1.*
For Nimbus DD1.** turn off periodics by default (zqcal and memcal). For Nimbus DD2.** it will be attribute driven without any restrictions.
True if NPU freeze (unit checkstop) should be disabled
Mask INT SUE FIR bit for Nimbus DD2.0 only
True if chip does not comtain HW399276 defect
Enable DP16 delay line tap point for DD2 and beyond
Register init for nimbus DD1 that is not necessary for DD2
Workaround for defect where clock enables to PHY were incorrectly driven
Workaround for Data mismatch discovered by Geyzer at certain async frequency ratios
Workaround for supporting memory to nest frequency ratios greater than 1.33
The Random number generator has different settings in dd1 and dd2
Nimbus DD1: Update the TSEL shadow copy by scanning as it't not connected to the SCOM reg.
Since amo cache clean line disabled for dd2, fix for HW401131 must also be disabled.
For Nimbus DD2 we no longer need a workaround for Ring Save in MPIPL
Cumulus only: MC chiplet requires scan clock in even cycle instead of odd
Cumulus only: dropping MC chiplet fence during arrayinit
Nimbus DD1 only: NPU2 FIR not present
Enable fix for HW399466 where all read data for amo smi ops is sent to rmw buffer.
Adjust FRTL latency overflow check for HW418091
Enable fix for HW355538 that enables write MDI to 1 for retry UE.
Not workaround or defect related. Just new dials to be set that are new in memory controller for DD2.
Work Load Optimized Frequency non-support in manufacturing.
Voltage Droop Monitor non-support in manufacturing.
DD1 update : Scan init VDM and IVRM latch workarounds. True if: Nimbus EC less than 20
DD1 update : Scan init DPL Jump Values (SCOMMABLE in DD2). True if: Nimbus EC less than 20
Common Attribute for INT DD1 spys
DD1 FBC setting differs from DD2, ex. lo_limit adjustment. True if: Nimbus EC less than 20
Workaround for HW412371 wrong lane getting trained in 11 lane mode. fixed in p9c dd1.1 Cumulus EC greater than 10
Returns true if spy name has usage only in P9C. Spy Name of Cumulus; Also used for cumulus only oscswitch settings.
GPTR support through MVPD is available in Nimbus DD2 and Cumulus and will NOT be if Nimbus DD1.
HW reset for XIVE unit is not working in DD1 or DD2. Potentially could be fixed in the future
